title: What are some great uncommon words to use in writing? - Quora

response.answer_text: They need not be uncommon, they need to make a mind pic. You don't say it was hot…you say, the sun burned their skin. Etc… You avoid adverbs & extra words like really..you avoid she say a thing.. No not a thing..get into your characters head & say what she first thought upon getting closer to see what it seemed, the first imaginings like it looked like a doll/ but was a baby.. or it had to be a manikin, but was a body..it????? Etc GL …..hugs
There aren’t any. Good writers make it a priority to engage and connect with their readers. They don’t use odd words just for the sake of showing off their vocabulary.
